name: Old Page Reminder
author: Brendan Nee

sections.description:
Keep your site’s content fresh. This plugin adds a box to the WordPress admin dashboard that lists all pages that haven’t been updated in recently. Every time you log in you’ll be able to quickly see which pages might need review to ensure the content is still correct and everything is up to date.

You can set the threshold in days for considering a page “old”, the default is 90 days.
sections.installation:
1. Upload old-page-reminder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. The “Pages that Haven’t Been Updated Recently” box will show up on your admin dashboard with links to pages that haven’t been updated recently.
  4. In the Settings->Page Reminder you can set the number of days before a page shows up on the dashboard panel. The default is 90 days.
sections.changelog:
0.2

  • Added admin settings options to choose number of days before a page shows up on the dashboard panel.

0.1

  • Plugin Launch

short_description: This plugin adds a box to the Wordpress admin dashboard that lists all pages that haven't been updated in 90 days.
